page.title: 08CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: CHILDREN STILL ENJOY MANY OF THE TRADITIONAL GAMES SUCH AS {SKIPPING,HOP-SCOTCH,}PLAYING {CONKERS. MARBLES}HOWEVER IS ONE OF THE OLDER GAMES THAT DOES NOT SEEM AS POPULAR AS IT ONCE WAS.MANY GAMES THAT ARE SEEN IN THE{PLAYGROUND}AND THE STREET ARE JUST UPDATED VERSIONS OF OLDER GAMES.ONE PARTICULAR FAVOURITE IS{ELASTIC,SKIPPING.BULLDOG}IS A GAME WHICH ANY NUMBER CAN PLAY.ONE PERSON IS IT.HE STANDS IN THE MIDDLE.THE OTHER PEOPLE STAND IN ONE OF THE SEMI CIRCLES.THE PERSON WHO IS IT CALLS A NAME OR SUBJECT AND THE PERSON WHO'S NAME HE CALLED HAS TO{RUN.}THE PERSON WHO IS IT HAS TO{CHASE}THE OTHER PEOPLE.THE IDEA OF THE GAME IS TO GET TO OTHER SIDE OF THE{PLAYGROUND WITHOUT BEING CAUGHT.{RULES}AND{STYLES MAY BE CHANGED ,BUT MANY GAMES REMAIN BASICALLY THE SAME.
